name: Mr. Green's Global Adventure
description:
A frog named Mr. Green goes on a global adventure to save Mrs. Green who
was taken to a zoo in Timbuktu. He travels across many locales around
the globe to find her. No obstacles can stop him, and no enemy is to
big for him to eat.

Features
  • Play 40 Levels Across 10 Locales in Any Order
  • Replay Levels to Try and Get All the Gold and Enemies and the Time Challenge
  • 4 Save Profiles
  • Backup Your Save File on Android 4.4 and Newer to Your Hard Drive or Compatible Cloud Storage Services
System Requirements
  • Android 2.3 or up
  • Linux: Tested on Debian 8.7.1
  • Mac: Tested on OS X 10.11.6
  • Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
System Permissions
  • Android: Bluetooth (used for Bluetooth Gamepads)
Input Methods
  • Keyboard (Android, Linux, Mac, Windows)
  • Gamepad (Android, Linux, Mac, Windows)
    • Most Wired/Wireless Gamepads on Android
    • Only Xbox Controllers on Linux
    • Only Xbox or PS3 Controllers on Mac
      • Xbox Controller Driver for Mac
    • Only Xbox Controllers on Windows
      • Or Download XOutput for D-Input Controllers
  • Touchscreen (Android)
